messages.content: 6, male, flight

He stands at four feet and seven inches, the wind gently blowing his dark brown hair. His name is Sam and he is a mischievous six-year-old with an unstoppable imagination and a desire for adventure. With bright green eyes, a slim frame and a cheeky smile, he always brings a lighthearted energy to any space.

His superpower is flight. With a few steady flaps of his arms and a soft chant, he can take off wherever he desires. His flight is silent, powerful and swift - the perfect way to explore any new adventure. He loves the feeling of freedom when soaring high in the sky, playing tag with the clouds.
6, male, flight

A 6-year-old boy, who stands at 4’5” and has a seemingly average appearance, has the rare superpower of flight. His medium brown hair is cut and straightened and his deep brown eyes reveal a big imagination, ready to explore the world. His friendly smile and kind disposition has earned him many friends. Despite his young age, he has a firm grasp of his power and a natural talent for soaring through the sky. When he is airborne, his small body glows with a pleasant light. He is a passionate explorer, using his power to explore distant lands and to expore the unknown. He is brave and resourceful and uses his powers to help the world in any way he can.
6, male, flight

Jimmy is a six-year-old male with short brown hair and bright blue eyes. He loves spending time outdoors, woodworking and tinkering with whatever he can find. His special superpower is the ability to fly! Jimmy can propel himself off the ground and take to the sky with ease. He loves to show off his flight and soar across the sky like a majestic bird. Jimmy’s wingspan is nearly as wide as his height, allowing him to reach remarkable heights and speeds. Jimmy loves using his power for good. He’s rescued an elderly woman from a burning building and has delivered meals to those in need during food shortages. He always puts others before himself and his superpower helps him do so.
6, male, telepathy

He is a joyous 6-year-old boy with a slim build and a mop of curly black hair. His eyes are a piercing deep brown and his smile is infectious. He loves to joke around and have fun. He has the superpower of telepathy, which gives him the ability to read minds and sense the thoughts of others. He is surprisingly adept at controlling his power and rarely gains unwanted insights. However, if he chooses to focus his attention, he can delve deep into the innermost feelings and thoughts of people around him. With this power, he is able to understand people and empathize with them more than any other 6-year-old.
6, male, telepathy

Will is a 6-year-old boy with a unique superpower, the ability to read minds. His curly dark brown hair and big brown eyes hint at his mixed Mexican and Native American heritage. He is bright but shy and loves playing dress up and exploring the world of make believe. He can often be found staring off into space, using his telepathy to pick up on conversations and thoughts from miles away. Although he can sometimes be overwhelmed by the number of thoughts he is able to access, he is fascinated by it, soaking in the knowledge and understanding of the complexities of the human mind. Will is a quiet but strong presence whose telepathy will prove invaluable.
6, male, telepathy

Harry is a 6-year-old boy with a special power: telepathy. His bright blue eyes reflect an inquisitive, kind soul. Harry has blond messy hair and soft lips that form a mischievous smile, often accompanied by a sneaky wink. He always wears a pair of soft, faded jeans and a comfortable, brightly-colored tee shirt. His superpower allows him to clearly hear the thoughts of others and transmit his own thoughts to others. Being six, he doesn't always understand the more complicated thoughts and ideas, but he loves creating stories, playing pretend and making others laugh with his innocent insight.
6, male, telekinesis

Timothy is a 6-year-old boy with a big heart and a big imagination. He stands 4'3" tall and has bright blue eyes and a mop of wavy brown hair. To people around him, Timothy appears to be an ordinary child. However, he has one extraordinary gift; the ability to move objects with his thoughts. His parents have noticed his skill, especially when small items go missing or when his toys fly around the room. Timothy is still learning to understand and control his power, but he loves to show off when he can make objects float or spin in the air.
6, male, telekinesis

George is a 6-year-old boy with curly, brown hair and soft, golden-brown eyes. He is a shy introvert, often found napping in his favourite armchair. But when he discovers his superpower of telekinesis, his timid personality is overshadowed by astonishing energy. He uses his power to soar endlessly around the sky and lift objects with his mind. Despite many attempts to keep it under wraps, his parents are aware of his supernatural ability, and constantly remind him to use it wisely. George is determined to use his power responsibly, and aims to become a hero one day.
6, male, telekinesis

Johnny is a lively 6-year-old boy with bright blue eyes, caramel-brown hair, and a gap-toothed smile. He loves to wear colorful clothes and go exploring in the woods. He has the unique superpower of telekinesis, allowing him to move, lift, or manipulate objects with his mind. He loves to show off his power to his friends and family, lifting apples, stones, and toys without even touching them. He is capable of lifting heavier objects, but as he is still growing, he has to keep his limits in check. At heart, Johnny is an adventurous and imaginative boy who dreams of using his power to make the world a better place.
6, male, x-ray vision

This 6-year-old is a bubbly and outgoing boy with a beaming smile. He has short white-blond hair and bright, blue eyes. He’s always ready to dive into a new adventure and loves investigating any mystery that catches his attention. He has the superpower of x-ray vision, allowing him to see through solid objects. When his curiosity gets the best of him, he puts on his special pair of glasses and can let his mind wander to the inner workings of everyday items. Although he's common a carefree kid, he never loses focus when using his ability and always remains aware of his surroundings.
6, male, x-ray vision

This 6-year-old boy has mop of curly blonde hair and bright blue eyes. He radiates pure energy, always ready for adventure. He loves playing outside and exploring the world around him. His superpower, x-ray vision, grants him the ability to see through solid objects, allowing him to explore the mysteries of the world in unique ways. He can spot a lost toy in a pile of endless objects, or tell if it's a toy or something else. With his enhanced vision, the unexplored secrets of the world come alive, and the 6-year-old is the guardian of the unknown. He dives into adventure to understand the world with a thrilling, clearly-sighted explorer’s eye.
6, male, x-ray vision

Jamie is a mischievous 6-year-old boy with a big imagination. He has an infectious laugh and a big heart. He loves to play games and explore the world. With his vibrant blue eyes, brown hair and a charming smile, he is quite an alluring character. His superpower of x-ray vision allows him to observe objects and people from far away and closely examine their hidden secrets. He quickly adapts himself to new situations and surprise everyone with his analytical skills and intuitive nature. He is sometimes overwhelmed by his power, but also inspired by the knowledge he can get from it. He is brave and persistent and never afraid to discover what is hidden from most people.
6, male, invisibility

This 6-year-old male character is a powerhouse of energy and enthusiasm, with a mop of light brown hair, bright blue eyes, and a mischievous grin. He possesses the superpower of invisibility, allowing him to bypass otherwise irrefutable rules and seek out adventure. He loves to explore and learn, often finding himself in places he shouldn't be. His cheeky personality makes him unafraid to take risks and discover what lies beneath. He surprises adults regularly with his knowledge, charm, and wit. His smile is infectious, and his enthusiasm is infectious. Despite all his powers, he still has the same challenges as any other 6-year-old, and handling responsibility can be difficult. He takes every opportunity to learn and grow.
6, male, invisibility

Harry is a spirited 6-year-old boy with a wild imagination and an insatiable curiosity. He has a mop of unruly dark hair, big brown eyes, and a mischievous smile. His superpower is the ability to turn invisible whenever he wants. He loves to use his superpower to explore places he would never be able to if he were visible, and it often comes in handy when he gets in trouble. Harry hides his superpower from adults and most of his friends, but he will use it when absolutely necessary. Although Harry can be quite naughty sometimes, he is a caring and kindhearted boy with an impulse control issue. He loves animals and playing outside, his favorite hobbies include making up stories and, of course, using his superpower!
6, male, invisibility

A six-year-old boy with a mischievous grin and unquenchable curiosity, he stands just slightly shorter than the average. With unruly jet black hair and wide ice blue eyes which sparkle with excitement and mirth, he is nothing short of magnetic to those around him. Possessing an inexplicable superpower of invisibility, he uses it to tease and prank those around him, making him quite popular in his small hometown. Not only comfortable in the physical realm but with a highly active imagination, the boy loves to get lost in the magical stories he dreams up. All in all, a classic kid, with a classic superpower.
6, male, immortality

This 6-year-old boy has shoulder-length wavy brown hair, twinkling blue eyes and chubby rosy cheeks which give him an innocent and gentle appearance. He wears colorful and eclectic clothing and is always full of energy and enthusiasm. He has the power of immortality, which grants him invulnerability to physical harm, greatly increased longevity and the ability to pass his immorality onto others. He lives life to the fullest and has a mischievous and daring spirit. He can experience danger with a degree of confidence and bravery unparalleled by other children his age. His nimbleness and adventurous spirit make him incredibly hard to keep up with - or contain.
6, male, immortality

Tommy is a 6-year-old boy with a remarkable superpower; he has the gift of immortality. His ability to resist age and sickness means that he never ages and is healthy and vibrant no matter how old he gets. He is of an average height for his age, with bright blue eyes. His jet black hair is a wild and chaotic tangle, partially obscuring his sparkling eyes. His charming demeanor means that everyone from all walks of life gravitate to him, attracted by his effortless spirit and wonderful outlook on life. His eager playfulness and zest for life are contagious, and his presence can be a soothing comfort, in any situation. His superpower of immortality gives him unique insight into the world.
6, male, immortality

Six-year-old Jake has a mysterious power that few in this world would ever imagine - the power of immortality. His keen brown eyes often betray his old soul, which has seen and lived through more than he should have. He has a love of music that knows no bounds, singing loudly and proudly whenever he gets the chance to do so. His small frame appears average, although his superhuman strength grants him the ability to lift and carry more than one would expect of a boy his age. Despite his power, he has a playful side, one that loves nothing more than to explore and have adventures. It is almost like possibilities are endless for him.
6, male, mind reading

Rhyder is an imaginative 6-year-old with a special gift - the ability to read minds. He has jet black hair and fair skin, with a mischievous sparkle in his chocolate brown eyes. He loves to explore and has an offbeat sense of humour. He loves animals and has a black cat, Shade, who loves to be around him. He's always interested in learning new things, and loves to spend time alone dreaming up the most curious scenarios. His mind-reading ability gives him an edge over the other kids, allowing him to know what someone is thinking or what they're planning - which often gives him an advantage in difficult situations.
6, male, mind reading

Marley is a 6-year-old boy with blonde hair and bright blue eyes. He loves to play with his friends and has an amazing power to read minds. He can sense the thoughts and feelings of those around him and can sense danger before it even manifests. He appears as an ordinary child, but is able to use his special power in incredible ways. He notices intricacies in conversations and is able to use that to his advantage in situations. He has a unique sense of wisdom and understanding that sets him apart from other kids. He is brave and uses his powers for the greater good — to help make the world a better place.
6, male, mind reading

This 6-year-old is a bright and enthusiastic boy. He has a mop of brown curls and bright, penetrating grey eyes that seem to almost read people's thoughts. His superpower is mind reading, giving him an extra layer of wisdom. He moves with a confident yet gentle grace, and has the ability to make people feel safe and understood. He's kindhearted, often giving away toys to younger kids or providing wise advice to adults beyond his years. His superhero costume consists of a twinkling blue cape paired with an intentional burst of sunshine yellow. He radiates an effortless energy and radiates positive vibes.
6, male, turn lead into gold

He stands 4’1 and has deep brown eyes, sandy-brown hair, and light brown skin. He is always wearing a logoed jacket given to him by his scientist-mentor and strong boots. He carries a bookbag overflowing with science experiments and gadgets where he stores WAP—his magical wand. His makeshift laboratory is usually in the basement or the backyard, tinkering away with his powers of transmutation. He is filled with joy, always searching for new ways to use his unique ability to turn lead into gold. He loves reading about science and getting creative with his work; always determined, he does it all with an infectious optimism and a contagious smile.
6, male, turn lead into gold

This 6-year-old little boy has a mischievous twinkle in his bright blue eyes. His shock of blonde hair often covers them in an unruly mess, while his crooked smile betrays his mischief. His body is small and agile, giving him a certain advantage to go with his power. His superpower is turning lead into gold, and he seems to take a special delight in using it. Whenever he is in trouble, he secretly converts worthless pieces of lead into valuable, hard-earned gold. His intuition and knowledge often exceed his age and his ability to manipulate lead to his benefit is utterly remarkable and awe-inspiring.
6, male, turn lead into gold

Mason is a 6-year-old boy with soft blond hair, bright blue eyes, and a warm smile. He has a kind heart and loves to be around people. He is also extremely intelligent and has a passion for learning. Everyone knows Mason for his extraordinary superpower — the ability to turn lead into gold. When Mason uses his power, a golden light emanates from his hands and brings light and luck to those around him. With his power, he can help provide the world with enough resources so everyone can live comfortably. He is a true superhero, making a real difference in the world, one lead at a time.
6, male, harness electrical power

This 6-year-old male has unruly blonde hair and bright blue eyes. He is short for his age and has a cheerful, mischievous personality. His superpower is the ability to absorb electricity and manifest it in many ways. With his power he can patrol the sky with glowing hands, zap opponents with lightning bolts, or even power large machines. He often wears a vivid yellow suit to show off his powers, completing the look with a pair of electric blue sneakers. This young boy has a kind heart and is always ready to lend a helping hand. Even when facing electrical overloads, he never loses his composure, instead finding new ways to channel his boundless energy.
6, male, harness electrical power

He is a 6-year-old male with an average height and build, bright blue eyes and a head full of dark brown hair. His clothing features bright pop-color stripes and patterns. He loves being active, loves learning and is always curious about how things work. His superpower allows him to harness electrical power, and he has mastered it to such a degree that he can manipulate currents of electricity. He can control electricity within the atmosphere, shoot off lightning-like electrical blasts, generate and manipulate mini-storms, and protect himself and others from external electrical forces. He loves using his superpower to play with friends, make people smile, or even just to lighten the mood.
6, male, harness electrical power

A 6-year-old boy with an energy crackling around him, he stands no taller than three and half feet. His expressive eyes are a deep green, and his hair is an unkempt blonde mop atop his head. His small frame contains an incredible power; the ability to draw energy from the electrical currents that flow around him. Wherever he goes energy seems to dance around him like a private light show, and he casts a faint shower of sparks into the air. Ever-curious, his exuberance and energy is contagious to those around him. His superpower promises to create a place of revelry for those electrically-powered around the world.
6, male, walk on liquid

This is Benjamin, a 6-year-old boy with the superpower of walking on water. He has brown hair and blue eyes, and usually wears bright, orange t-shirts and blue shorts. He loves to explore; whether it be lakes, rivers, or oceans. He can walk on liquid surfaces the same way he would on a walk in the park, unfazed. His superpower also allows him to inhabit any body of water and explore its depths. His favorite thing about this power is the feeling of weightlessness it provides. He is also capable of manipulating liquid, such as creating waves. Even at his young age, his abilities are extraordinary--sure to provide a lifetime of excitement and adventure.
6, male, walk on liquid

He stands 4 feet tall and weighs 55 pounds, with creamy skin and vibrant, auburn hair. He has striking blue eyes and a playful, dimpled smile. He wears a white cape with the red emblem of his liquid-walking superpower emblazoned on the back. He is full of life, enthusiasm and curiosity, and his enthusiasm only amplifies when he speaks about his superpower. His body buzzes with electricity and he can practically feel the molecular structure of the liquid when he steps into it. He excitedly bounces across any surface as if it were solid ground, and looks in awe at the shimmering liquid. He has found a way to make the most out of his ability and he is determined to make the world better by it.
6, male, walk on liquid

A 6-year-old boy with curly blonde hair and ocean-blue eyes stares ahead with determination. His superhero capabilities include the ability to walk on liquid; whether it’s a river, lake, or even a puddle, his feet can lock in and carry him across as if it was solid ground. His powers first appeared at the age of 3 when he captured the attention of the entire neighborhood by walking across a nearby pond without so much as a splash. Despite his superpower, the little hero is warm hearted and treats everyone with kindness and respect. He stands proud in his bright blue outfit, with a cape that sways with the wind, ready to save the day!
6, female, flight

Emily is a 6-year-old girl with curly brown hair, big green eyes and a petite frame. She loves to spend her days playing and running around outdoors. She has the superpower of flight and loves to take off in the sky and explore. Emily is brave, with a heart of gold, always looking for ways to help those around her. She flaps her arms and lifts off gracefully through the air like a bird, soaring and looping through the clouds. Her flybys are often accompanied by an infectious giggle, as she plays and relishes in her new found freedom.
6, female, flight

This 6-year-old female fictional character steps out into the world with a wild twinkle in her bright blue eyes and a mischievous grin lighting up her face. Her strawberry blonde curls are like a halo around her face, making her appear angelic. She loves to play and explore, like any child her age, but a special superpower sets her apart: flight. Whenever she is in need, she can effortlessly take to the air, soaring higher and higher until she's out of sight. She loves the freedom and independence that her power gives her. And, of course, the exhilarating feeling of wind in her hair, against her skin and through her clothes.
6, female, flight

The 6-year-old female character has a petite frame and is full of energy, eager to explore her superpower of flight. Her loose, mouse brown hair glistens in the sunlight as it matches the faint freckles across her nose. Her wide, sapphire eyes have never ending curiosity, often filled with excitement at the new experiences she faces. Even when she is soaring endlessly through the sky, she gives off a calming presence that can console someone’s worries and doubts. She always enjoys the feeling of wind in her face as she flies as free as a bird, living in the moment. Her favorite mode of transport is of course, flying and while midair, she can create powerful gusts of wind with a simple flick of her wrist.
6, female, telepathy

Lanie is a 6 year old girl with a unique superpower - telepathy. She has long, curly hair, big brown eyes and a playful, curious attitude with a hint of mischief. She loves to dress up in sparkly princess dresses, twirl around and make people laugh. She has an eagerness for knowledge and being in the spotlight, though she's often too shy to talk much in public. A skilled manipulator of thoughts, she can control the actions of others with her mind, although she doesn't yet realise the true power of her abilities. Still, she can sense good and bad thoughts and feelings of those around her. Lanie is an imaginative, brave and gentle soul.
6, female, telepathy

Tara is a 6-year-old girl with a kind face and big hazel eyes. She has round cheeks, long black hair and her favourite dress is a blue and pink patterned dress. She loves playing with her dolls, making up stories and singing.

Tara also has the special superpower of telepathy; she can read people’s thoughts and feelings without even speaking to them. She is still learning how to use her powers with control and responsibility. To help her with this, Tara has an invisible friend named Jolene who guides her and encourages her throughout her adventures.
6, female, telepathy

Celia is a 6-year-old girl with long, dark brown hair and electric blue eyes. She has an infectious smile and a contagious laugh. With her warm, generous personality, Celia easily charms anyone in her presence. 

Celia has the power of telepathy - the ability to read thoughts and communicate with others mentally. She sometimes has difficulty controlling and focusing her telepathic energy, particularly when she is excited or distressed. Despite this, Celia loves connecting with people through her power and eagerly uses it to help anyone in need. 

Though her superpower is admirable, Celia is an ordinary six-year-old at heart. She loves playing with her friends, exploring the outdoors, and daydreaming about all the imaginative places she'll explore in the future.
6, female, telekinesis

Bonnie is a 6-year-old girl with long curly blonde hair and bright blue eyes. She is a curious and active child who loves to explore her surroundings. She is independent, imaginative, and full of energy. Bonnie has the special ability of telekinesis – she can move objects with her mind. She has learned to use this power carefully and responsibly, and loves to use it to surprise and delight those around her. She has impressive control and range, able to lift objects of various sizes without difficulty. Bonnie's power has given her confidence and she proudly uses it to help her friends and family.
6, female, telekinesis

This six-year-old girl is full of life, her energy and enthusiasm for the world infectious. Her brown eyes sparkle with mischief and her bright, friendly smile hides a powerful secret. She has the ability to move things with her mind, a power she refers to as 'telekinesis'. Her awe-inspiring ability has no limits– she can move objects of all shapes and sizes with a flick of her wrist or a single thought, throwing them gently through the air or spinning them rapidly in circles. But she never uses her gift lightly, only using it when it's really necessary. She knows her power gives her a big responsiblity and she takes it very seriously.
6, female, telekinesis

Alice is a 6-year old girl with a phenomenal superpower. She can move objects with her mind--that's right, she has telekinesis! Her power is limited to small objects like books and toys, but that doesn't stop her from finding creative ways to use it. Her bright blue eyes sparkle with excitement as she moves things around, and she often gets lost in her own little world. Alice is a friendly and bubbly child, and her superpower only serves to fuel her outgoing and imaginative nature even further.
6, female, x-ray vision

A six-year-old girl with rosy cheeks and dark curls cascading down her shoulders stands at 3 feet, 6 inches tall. Her sapphire eyes peer inquisitively around her surroundings, her inquisitive nature leading her to innocently unlock her superpower of x-ray vision. With it, she can see through walls and obstacles that would otherwise be hidden to the naked eye. She has the ability to investigate and solve mysteries, and she loves to do so with enthusiasm. Despite her young age, she displays a great level of maturity and inquisitiveness which often leads her to successful findings. Her power may be odd, but she loves the unique experience it gives her, and she's always full of energy and ready to explore the world.
6, female, x-ray vision

Mia is an energetic, 6-year-old with a curious spirit and raccoon-like personality. She’s full of life and shows an impressive sense of maturity despite her age. Her eyes sparkle with a hint of blue, yet can shift and deepen if aglow with her incredible superpower of x-ray vision. All she needs to do is to focus her eyes on and concentrate on the thing she wants to see and her vision shifts like that of an x-ray machine. Personable, wise and eager to learn, Mia loves nothing more than to explore the world. Whether it's helping others or questioning the unknown, Mia’s energy and passion for life run through her soul, radiating from her blue eyes.
6, female, x-ray vision

A playful young 6-year-old girl, with bright blonde hair that reaches her shoulders and big blue eyes, has the superpower of x-ray vision. She loves to dress up in her favorite colors, purple and pink, whenever she can. With her x-ray vision, she's able to see through walls, fly through the air and even visualize thoughts. She uses her superpower to help people and finds solutions to difficult problems. Her powers are not only a source of entertainment, but they have also saved her family and friends from danger. Her altruistic attitude, combined with her unique superpower, makes her a natural source of strength in her community.
6, female, invisibility

This 6-year-old girl is a tenderhearted force of nature. She has shiny black hair with a few streaks of blonde, piercing emerald green eyes, a button nose and lips that look like they are always smiling. She stands at barely 4ft tall and her thin frame appears delicate and fragile. 

But don't be fooled, this little girl has the superpower of invisibility - a handy trick she learned at a young age to get around her busy family. She can disappear and reappear as quickly and quietly as she pleases. Her agility and curiosity make her a formidable opponent, and her sharp intuition makes her an expert in sneaking around. 

Her bravery, attention to detail and quick thinking are what make her different. Superpower or not, she is an impressive girl.
6, female, invisibility

A 6 year old fictional girl stands innocently before you, laughing as if she is unaware of the power she has. She has jet black hair cut into a neat bob and bright green eyes that turn darker as she uses her power. Her pale skin stands in contrast to her rosy cheeks. She wears a costume of white and pink, with a flowing cape around her shoulders. She stands just a few feet tall, but her presence is still intimidating. She has the power of invisibility, allowing her to disappear from sight at any moment. She loves using her power to explore, play with her friends and go on fantastic adventures. A powerful and extraordinary little girl, she is also kind and sweet.
6, female, invisibility

This 6 year old girl appears tiny and fragile with her dark gossamer hair framing her soft-featured face. Her round eyes sparkle with both joy and a deep understanding of the world that only children possess. When she wills it, she has the power to become completely invisible, though she must focus and concentrate her energy in order to do so. She is wise beyond her years, but it shines through in playful exuberance. She is an enigma, elusive and spontaneous. Her invisibility allows her freedom to experience the world in ways childhood fantasies are made of. Yet while she universally enjoys the presence of others, her true solace resides in her ability to explore the world unseen.
6, female, immortality

A petite 6-year old girl with short brown hair, warm brown eyes, and skin like freshly-fallen snow, she is was a bundle of sunlight and joy. She radiates a bright, contagious energy that inspires those around her. With her superpower of immortality, she frolics, carefree, weaving in and out of the world, enjoying eternity with childlike enthusiasm. To those she comes across, they’re left feeling overwhelmed with hope and comfort, lifted by the loving connection they share. She is beyond sweet, a pure and humble soul, always brimming with strength and courage. She is a blessing, a glimpse of pure goodness that will never fade away.
6, female, immortality

Sofia is a 6-year-old female superhero with the power of immortality. Her bright green eyes shimmer with enthusiasm, while her tousled, blonde hair whips around her face in the wind. She has a petite build, with delicate features that reflect her sharp intelligence. Sofia is never without a smile and loves nothing more than making others laugh. Her powers give her the ability to heal herself instantly and to stay in the same child form while everyone around her ages. With her agelessness, she's experienced decades worth of knowledge and has the wisdom to use it in dangerous situations.
6, female, immortality

A 6-year-old towheaded girl with piercing blue eyes and a mischievous smirk. Her skin glows with a vitality uniquely her own, as if a part of her is always shining. Her laughter radiates like bright sunshine. Poised but playful, she revels in the wonders of life, her never-ending curiosity illuminating her small face. She has an astounding superpower - immortality. She has seen more than any other 6-year-old and yet still retains the innocent giddiness of childhood. Like a flame she is constantly moving, her soul radiating an ethereal, luminescent beauty. A living storybook, she has an inextinguishable passion for life and a zest for exploration. She is a supernatural being that can never grow old and will never cease living.
6, female, mind reading

Alice is a 6-year-old girl with an extraordinary secret power – she can read minds. Her large and expressive eyes are a shade of blue-green and are full of life and wonder. Her small stature and fair skin are accented by a wild mop of auburn-streaked hair. Despite her age, Alice’s intelligent and perceptive nature often inspire those around her. She finds joy in discovering new secrets and can be quite analytical when she focuses her powers. Her ability to sense the emotions of others make her kind and supportive, often to her own surprise. Alice loves to explore the world around her and view it with fresh, intuitive insights. She’s capable of much more than even she realizes.
6, female, mind reading

6-year-old Jayne is an precocious and independent little girl with an incredible superpower - mind reading. She has long wavy blonde hair, big blue eyes and beautifully fair skin, and loves to dance and tell stories. According to her parents, Jayne was blessed with the power to read peoples' thoughts and feelings at a very young age. She can sense anything from secrets to emotions and can often predict the future. Even though Jayne keeps her superpower a secret, her ability to connects with people on a deeper level through her innate empathy makes her special beyond comparison.
6, female, mind reading

Ajla is a 6-year-old girl with the superpower of mind reading. She has uncanny insight into the thoughts, intentions and emotions of people around her. Her long, wavy brown hair and dark eyes seem to draw people in, making them feel easily connected to her. This feeling is enhanced by her compassionate, kind-hearted demeanor. She is intuitive and gentle, but always curious and playful. She is a natural listener and even better observer. Ajla’s superpower combined with her familiarity of the world around her gives her the ability to do extraordinary things. Ajla exudes a sense of self-confidence, yet radiates a welcoming charm that puts people’s minds at ease when in her presence. In her short life, she’s already making a profound impact on those she encounters.
6, female, turn lead into gold

Mia loves playing imaginative games, especially with her superpower of turning lead into gold. At 6 years old, she has a petite frame, deep blue eyes and long blonde hair that she loves to wear in two pigtails.
